Package database.dao

Class ProblemDatabase

java.lang.Object
database.dao.ProblemDatabase
public class ProblemDatabase extends Object
Wraps raw SQL connections to the problem table in a more accessible API
Version:
- June 1st 2023
Author:
Tommy Shan

  • Constructor Details

    • ProblemDatabase

      public ProblemDatabase() throws SQLException
      Constructs the object and initializes its data. Creates a problems table if it does not exist.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

  • Method Details

    • addProblem

      public void addProblem(Problem problem) throws SQLException
      addProblem Attempts to add a problem to the problems table.
      Parameters:
      problem - the problem to be inserted
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

    • getProblemById

      public Problem getProblemById(int targetId) throws SQLException
      getProblemById Attempts to retrieve a problem with its id.
      Parameters:
      targetId - the id of the problem
      Returns:
      the requested problem or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

      public Problem getProblemByTitle(String targetTitle) throws SQLException
      getProblemByTitle Attempts to retrieve a problem with its title
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the requested problem or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

    • getProblemByType

      public List<Problem> getProblemByType(String targetType) throws SQLException
      getProblemByTitle Attempts to retrieve a problem with its type
      Parameters:
      targetType - the type/category of the problem
      Returns:
      a list of all problems with the specified type
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

    • getAllProblems

      public List<Problem> getAllProblems() throws SQLException
      getAllProblems Attempts to retrieve a problem with its type
      Returns:
      a list of all problems
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL

    • populateFromDirectory

      public void populateFromDirectory(String baseDirectory) throws IOException, SQLException
      populateFromDirectory Loads problems from a base directory. Searches for a `problem.txt` file in each problem folder and parses it for metadata.
      Parameters:
      baseDirectory - the directory containing all the problems
      Throws:
      IOException - if an exception occurs while opening or reading files
      SQLException - if an error occurs while using SQL
